examples.integral: Do you have sunglasses?
Emilia buys some red pants.
Mar sees Silvio at the store.
examples.derivative: Mar ve a Silvio en la tienda.

examples.integral: The professor observes the student.
examples.derivative: El profesor observa a la estudiante.

examples.integral: Do you have sunglasses?
Do you use them often?
Do you have a briefcase?
Do you take it on job interviews?
examples.derivative: ¿Lo llevas a las entrevistas de trabajo?

examples.integral: me
you (informal, object)
him/her (object)
us
you all (informal, object)
them(masculine)/them(feminine) (object)

groups.title: DIRECT OBJECT PRONOUNS WITH PRESENT PROGRESSIVE

examples.integral: I'm looking for you. (object pronoun at beginning)
I'm looking for you. (object pronoun attached to verb)

groups.title: DIRECT OBJECT PRONOUNS WITH VERB PHRASES

examples.integral: Mar wants to buy it (feminine). (object pronoun at beginning)
Mar wants to buy it (feminine). (object pronoun attached to verb)
They(masculine) are going to see us. (object pronoun at beginning)
They(masculine) are going to see us. (object pronoun attached to verb)
me (indirect object)
you (informal, indirect object)
him or her (indirect object)
us (indirect object)
you all (informal, indirect object)
you (formal, indirect object) or them (indirect object)
Mar buys the purse for her mother.
examples.derivative: Mar le compra el bolso a su madre.

examples.integral: Mar buys gifts for her mother and her boyfriend.
examples.derivative: Mar les compra regalos a su madre y a su novio.

examples.integral: Will you carry the shopping for me, please?
examples.derivative: Mar: ¿ Me llevas las compras, por favor?

examples.integral: Of course! I'll carry them for you.
examples.derivative: Silvio: ¡ Claro que sí! Te las llevo.

examples.integral: Will you carry them for me?
Sorry. I can't carry them right now.
examples.derivative: Lo siento. No puedo llevártelas ahora.

examples.integral: I'm carrying them for my grandmother.
examples.derivative: Se las llevo a mi abuela.

examples.integral: That jacket is pleasing to me
